channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 权力的游戏》的主创们正在着手制作他们的第一个 Netflix 项目。这一次，主角不再是龙和异鬼，而是脱水的尸体、复杂的物理学和外星人的入侵。
item.description:
The "Game of Thrones" creators are embarking on their first Netflix project. This time, instead of dragons and White Walkers, there are dehydrated bodies, complicated physics and an alien invasion. https://t.co/HL1oL0hdpq https://t.co/HL1oL0hdpq

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国人正在向一款中国应用程序寻求关于发型、妆容和其他造型的残酷而诚实的建议。它不是 TikTok。
item.description:
Americans are turning to a Chinese app for brutally honest advice about their hair, makeup and other looks. And it isn’t TikTok. https://t.co/GDxkTDRhgf https://t.co/GDxkTDRhgf

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 观看：如果赢得 2024 年总统大选，拜登总统和唐纳德-特朗普希望实施的税收计划大相径庭
item.description:

item.title: 联邦调查、马虎的工厂、愤怒的航空公司和紧张的工会谈判。下一任波音公司首席执行官将不得不解决戴维-卡尔霍恩（David Calhoun）上任时要解决的一些同样的问题。
item.description:
Federal probes, sloppy factories, angry airlines and tense union negotiations. The next Boeing CEO will have to address some of the same issues that David Calhoun was brought on to clean up. https://t.co/HjBpGwWOtj https://t.co/HjBpGwWOtj

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 这道低热量、一碗一锅的胡萝卜蛋糕食谱既优雅又简单，在周末和节假日都非常适合。从现在起，它绝对会成为你的首选。
item.description:
Elegantly simple and absolutely foolproof, this low-lift, one-bowl, one-pan carrot cake recipe works as well on a weeknight as it does on a holiday. It will definitely be your go-to from now on. https://t.co/BfzckqWNmC https://t.co/BfzckqWNmC

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 全世界的女性都报告说，她们比男性更苦恼也更满意自己的生活。@EmilyBobrow 问，这是怎么回事？
item.description:
Women around the world report being both more distressed and more satisfied with their lives than men. @EmilyBobrow asks, what’s going on? https://t.co/XqKfwjj9up https://t.co/XqKfwjj9up

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 维多利亚-贝克汉姆（Victoria Beckham）知道你想谈论那**劳斯莱斯备忘录。以下是事情的经过，以及她日常生活中的更多细节。
item.description:

item.title: 密西西比河港口小镇纳奇斯可能不在您的必游清单上。但是，对于那些追求美食、友好的人们以及对历史的冷静和不加修饰的审视的人来说，它应该是必到之地。
item.description:
Natchez, a small Mississippi River port town, may not be on your must-travel list. But for anyone after good food, friendly people and a sober, unglorified look at history, it should be. https://t.co/KcGKsVRUCl https://t.co/KcGKsVRUCl

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 正在开发的血液稀释剂可以预防导致心脏病发作和中风的血凝块，而且没有一些副作用

item.title: ☕ 最好的一天始于一杯好咖啡；这一点毋庸置疑。但是，最好的咖啡是如何制作出来的？以下是关于晨间冲泡咖啡的五个神话，以及为什么它们都是胡说八道。
item.description:
☕ The best days begin with a great cup of coffee; this much is indisputable. But how are the best cups of coffee made?

Here, five myths about your morning brew and why they’re baloney. https://t.co/i1yrYYYVN2 https://t.co/i1yrYYYVN2

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 克里斯蒂娜-帕克（Christina Park）16 岁时在一次遗产拍卖会上淘到了自己的 1958 年 DeSoto Firesweep Sportsman，修整后偶尔开着它去上学。"人们对它有点惊讶"
item.description:
Christina Park found her 1958 DeSoto Firesweep Sportsman at an estate sale when she was 16 and occasionally drove it to school after fixing it up. "People were a little astonished by it." https://t.co/i77l5HEJwx https://t.co/i77l5HEJwx

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: "我太年轻了，不适合变老"。人们不遗余力地减少或阻止白发苍苍的过程。一些研究衰老问题的科学家认为，他们可能有所发现。
item.description:
“I’m too young to be old.” People are going to great lengths to reduce or halt the graying process. Some scientists of aging think they might be onto something. https://t.co/llVCZDtF0d https://t.co/llVCZDtF0d

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 来自亚利桑那州的 29 岁潜水事故受害者、四肢瘫痪者诺兰德-阿博夫（Noland Arbaugh）最详尽地讲述了他作为第一个接受 Neuralink 脑计算机植入的人的经历。
item.description:
Noland Arbaugh, a 29-year-old diving-accident victim and quadriplegic from Arizona, gave the most extensive account yet of his experience as the first person to receive Neuralink’s brain-computer implant https://t.co/lqpLrh9rP6 https://t.co/lqpLrh9rP6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在墨尔本和珀斯之间的航班上，飞行员关闭了空客 A330 的一个发动机，澳航工程师将对其进行检查。

item.title: 今年的大学招生可谓 "一团糟"。联邦财政补助申请、考试要求和平权法案的变化带来了混乱。
item.description:
College admissions is a “hot mess” this year. Changes to the federal financial-aid application, testing requirements and affirmative action have sown chaos. https://t.co/c9N5wQTwxx https://t.co/c9N5wQTwxx

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：当进步人士无法说服公众时，他们就会援引有问题的科学，并试图让法院强制执行他们赞成的政策。阿莉西亚-芬利（Allysia Finley）写道，其结果是自由派公共卫生机构面临危机。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: When progressives can’t persuade the public, they invoke questionable science and try to get courts to impose the policies they favor. The result is a crisis for the liberal public-health establishment, writes Allysia Finley. https://t.co/A9uvrYopzl

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 26, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：古巴人民正在挨饿。哈瓦那制造了古巴岛最新的饥饿危机。不要相信指责美国制裁的宣传，@MaryAnastasiaOG 写道。
item.description:

item.title: "我的孩子们真的很会讨价还价"。正在讨论禁止或强制销售 TikTok 的立法者面临着激烈的游说--来自他们自己的青少年。
